name: Betis Adventures
description:
When Beti's village gets visited by a giant eagle, it threatens to destroy everything unless it is fed. Facing the destruction of the villagers' world, Beti is sent out to solve the crisis - and you must help... Rats, frogs, and other enemies and traps will try to stop Beti's progress. It's up to you to defeat them and collect gems and fruits as you explore a beautiful world, including seven levels and leading up to an epic final boss battle!

Version 1.0 includes:
> Classic platforming & jumping gameplay
> Seven levels with beautiful maps
> Leaderboard System
> Achievements System
> Secret rooms and ladders give secrets to find throughout the game
> Range of enemies with different movement & tactics needed to win
> Final boss battle at the end of level seven
